name: Druidic
info: All are ranged except Sickle Slash.
Sacrifice requires plant or animal to burn or wine to pour.

style.name: Birth
style.short-description: Stunted Freak Twin erupts from target's flesh: Freak, Bite d10/d4, 1 dmg 0 Mood, 0 armor, 3 Body
style.description:
Crazed with jealousy or bestial bloodlust, a stunted freak twin bursts from the target's skin.
Usually the freak twin is a tiny head with misshapen hands on spindly arms and a torso that melds with the host's body. The Freak has 3 Body, rolls a d4 defense each round, and bites its host or an adjacent ally at d10 for 1 point of damage each round. In special cases, the GM may assign other qualities, defenses, or attacks to the freak.

style.name: Fertility
style.short-description: Swelling: -1 Qck per round until Birth
style.description: Something quickens subcutaneously in your target; the swelling causes 1 point of Quickness damage. After the target has taken 3 points of Quickness damage from this spell, you can cast Birth on him. The Quickness damage need not be in consecutive rounds.

style.name: Sacrifice
style.description: You must burn a plant (preferably mistletoe, but it need not be), slaughter an animal (mouse-size or larger), or pour a libation. If you do not have any of these things at hand, you cannot cast this spell.

style.name: Chill Bog
style.description:
This has the same effects as a bog.
In addition, the freezing peat and miasmal morass makes a d8 attack that is physical, not magical, each round. The attack goes against all in the area affected, be they friend or foe, and it does 1 point of damage and forces a rebalance on a hit.

style.name: Bog
style.short-description: 1 area becomes bog (Str. vs. Doom to move) Lasts until you re-cast
style.description: A character can exit or enter the area only after making a successful Strength vs. Doom roll.

style.name: Sun's Bounty
style.short-description: Up to 5 allies do +2 damage next round
style.description: As usual, the bonus damage applies to each attack. So if the druid's 5 allies each execute a maneuver with two attacks next round and all attacks hit, this spell supplies a total of 20 points of extra damage.

style.name: Sun and Fire Glare
style.short-description: -2 attack die size next round Attack 3 targets

style.name: Burn Mistletoe
style.description: This spell has no effect other than to burn the mistletoe. Next round, you fan the flames into a Gale of Fire or flare them into an enemy's eyes with the Sun and Fire Glare spell.
